name: Gurnard Perch Sophisticated  Technologies
overview:
Gurnard Perch Sophisticated Technologies is a new style business accelerator for global internet startups. We combine business concepts of accelerator, incubator and venture fund. All GPST projects are funded by business angels.

What is our advantages for startups and enterpreneurs?

  • we are not looking for enterpreneur with team
  • we are not looking for enterpreneur with idea
  • we are not looking for investors, startup is funded from the beginning

We are looking for talented tech professional with enterpreneur dreams and give them all they need:

  • ideas
  • contractors
  • funding
  • place
  • atmosphere
  • mentoring
  • networking
  • opportunities

What projects we work with?

  • global
  • internet
  • simple
  • genius
  • fun or really needed by market

Our mission is to give global opportunities for talented geeks.

Our goal - is to increase success probabilities for our projects.

Our process - is optimized startup conveyor. Process key elements are coworking, reusing, common resources, well tryied contractors, early proof of concept, business oriented approach, continuous learning, creative atmosphere, minimalism and results concentration.

We are open for all opportunities, communications and partnerships, please, feel free to contact us anytime)
